We love this protein shake. No after taste, it mixes well, meaning it's not lumpy. It's creamy even without milk and even better with some milk. Each serving has a good amount of protein and it's a good addition to my diet. My husband is picky and he loves it.

i have bought several of these over the last couple of years... i use it five days a week and have been very happy with the product, in the last year the price has gone up to the point that it seems more like price gouging !!.. also the last order packaging said vanilla and inside the bag is chocolate ... WTF ??... also the consistency is far different from all of the other ones, I've taken it long enough to know that the texture and mixability is not right...i won't be buying again.. a damn shame but i no longer trust the product !!
Me encanto este producto
I use this at work when i don't have time for breaks.  Keeps ne going without feeling hungry.

I typically order the larger 4 pound container. Since there was a delay with availability and shipping, and the 2 pound was more readily available, I ordered it instead. I will not be making that mistake again. Although the same protein and same flavor, the taste is drastically different and overall awful. There is a bitter aftertaste, along with a "medicine like" flavor, as if some ingredient was old or past expiration. I've ordered the 4 pound container more times than I can count and I have not had this experience once. Next time, I will either wait on the shipping of the 4 pound container to or go with a different brand altogether. I just hope this is not a "new and improved" formula for the milk chocolate flavor.

Chocolate flavor is good, mixes easily in a shaker bottle. Texture is smoother if you let it sit for 15-20 minutes and then shake it up again. Great with ice, almond milk, a banana, and peanut butter powder!
So I have been using this for years, don’t care if they changed the packaging but the flavor also changed and it’s just not good. The taste is powdery and bitter, yuck!
Nothing

Their Customer service sucks. There is never anyone available at their phone number and they never call you back. The first delivery I got of this, the container was already open. The Seal was from what I could tell never placed on the container. The second shipment, which I paid for showed up fine. But they have never addressed the issue with the first container being Opened. I like the product but this company doesn't appear to care about customer service. Hence the 3 star rating even though I like the product.

I'm not sure if MusleTech changed their receipe, or if I got a bad batch. I've been using their protein for nearly a year now, it had always tasted great, no problems.The batch I got last month was so sickening. It had a strange smell, and would make my stomach turn after drinking it. I'm going to order another batch, not from amazon, to see if there is a difference.Went from a 5 star product, to 2 star. Gross.

I am 50yr old male…..I don’t buy or take any supplements except protein powder ….I used ON 100% Whey for like 5 yrs…..great product! But when I decided to try something different….I chose Nitro Tech! Now I had already been exercising 3x wk religiously for yrs….I gained strength,,,,,, like 10lb increase on most lifts plus everything just seem to pop more….biceps, legs and chest! I’m 5.10 and 185 and definitely look better👍
Label says it may contain carageenan but not sure if it really does. Anyway that stuff is bad but it cleans up in the blender well and doesnt give me hert burn or huge gas, 5 stars.
best flavor ive ever had! i love to put it in my coffee.

After multiple purchases of this powder it appears they have changed the formula and the info on the purchase page is not correct. looks like I will be going elsewhere as the new formula is inferior and tastes terrible.

I've never left an Amazon review but I've been using this protein powder for over a year now, and there is just something way off about the taste of my most recent order I got delivered this week. It just has a weird salty/artificial after-taste that I haven't noticed before. It's not inedible just way worse than the last "batch."Very disappointing because I ordered 3 bins with the prime day deal.
If you like super sweet stuff this is for you. My opinion is the vanilla flavor is so strong and tastes gross because of it. Choking this down made me nauseous.

My biggest pet peeves with protein powders are that weird after taste some powders have and not being able to dissolve completely in the milk. Before purchasing this, i was drinking Orgain vanilla protein powder with PBfit. At the time it was the only powder i could tolerate but it was not easily "blendable" with my blender bottle. I decided to try this flavor as i have heard a lot about this brand in the past couple months, and I've been pleasantly surprised! It tastes just like the milk that is left over after you eat fruity cereal and it also blended so easily; there were absolutely no clumps in my shake. The price is pretty average for what's on the market so overall I am happy with my purchase and I will most likely continue to buy this brand.

I know there are a ton of negative reviews on this product. After I ordered it I seen reviews of people receiving opened containers, product with bugs in it and other weird items, expired product etc. For me, I ordered the fruity pebbles flavor, mixed it with a plastic fork in milk just fine, no bugs, not expired and seems very high quality. I also noticed after taking my first serving, my stomach isn't bloated at all. It sits very easy on my stomach. The fruity pebble milk flavor is dead on. Taste just like milk after fruity pebbles. I will be ordering this instead of my ghost protein moving forward, I like the bcaas in it for post and recovery and it sits on my stomach better.

I used this protein powder for about 2 months. I originally bought this powder because it is third party tested and certified. Yet, I have found cheaper better tasting powders that are certified for almost half the price. In order to down this smoothie I could not drink it without peanut butter and chocolate syrup added. When I first got it I was curious and tried it only with water. That was a mistake it was so bad I had to dump it. Which really sucked because this stuff is not cheap. Between my husband and I we get 10 days of smoothies for one tub. The one I am currently using now gives us 8 but it ALOT cheaper. I will say this stuff is top quality and never upset my stomach. Honestly if the flavor was better I would have continued paying the higher price tag for it.

First time buying a powder protein. I am a 130 lb senior vegetarian, no meat very little fish, so I'm using for extra protein. I have to say it took me a full 10 minutes to get the cover unscrewed!! I ended up using rubber grip gloves and finally put one on the floor put the container on top of it and pushed down and finally got the cover off!!!! I tried it by using half a scoop in 8 oz. of almond milk in a shaker bottle and I have to say there were some lumps. The vanilla taste is not bad and I did not get an aftertaste.

I’ve used this companies products in the past. I was looking for a flavor they had in the past which was Raspberry Zinger. It was no longer available and decided to try this. And honestly? I like it as much if not better than the Raspberry Zinger flavored one. Super tasty, great protein powder without throwing a big spike at my blood sugar levels and great as a meal replacement for me. (Do what works for you)

I am not a fan of powders. I will sell my soul to get a premade protein drink rather than have powder, but as a mom with ever decreasing funds I sucked it up and settled on trying this one out next. After a long line of trying awful powders, I think I have found a brand I can stomach and flavor I actually like! So far I have tried this mixed with almond milk as just a regular shake with my blender ball and then mixed with a small amount of almond milk and thrown in my cup of coffee. Some might say that is disgusting and I fully thought it would be, however I was oh so pleasantly surprised. This is normally how I dink my coffee and protein in the morning (caffeine for my migraines)- not cold brew because I don't have time for that- and it was like a little cup of memories. I was not expecting to actually like it, so that was a huge win. It IS sweet and the pebbles bits are just that-bits in the powder-so expect those when you make it, however the taste and consistency are top notch.  110% recommend if you are on the fence.

I was skeptical of getting this as I don’t like the after taste of protein powders mixed with my coffee in the morning. However, this product mixes so well! It has enough of the coffee flavor without being too overpowering. I add a scoop to my espresso and a splash of milk and it taste like a latte! Makes getting protein in the morning so much easier, try it out!!!

Really good flavor! Love mixing this in with their chocolate peanut butter flavor.The only issue with this otherwise fantastic protein is that this version's caffeine is like...REALLY STRONG. It makes my heart thud and can even cause some very mild panic attack feelings if I do a bit over a single scoop (which, while ~110mg+ of caffeine, shouldn't feel that bad).I enjoy this as a half scoop with a full scoop of their regular non-caffeinated protein.

I would like to start off by saying this is NOT a paid ad (I wish It was considering how many containers I go through of ISO100 every year)I’ve ordered many flavors from ISO100 and the peanut butter flavor is very new to me and I was very skeptic of the flavor being similar to reese's cups like the reviews were saying. I’ve tried many protein powders and ISO 100 almost never fails me, it’s always smooth & doesn’t taste like chalk.  I ordered anyways to try for myself, and the flavor…. It’s spot on like Reese’s cups.New flavor unlocked lol!!!!

I’m caffeine sensitive so I’ve really been searching for something that sort of tastes like coffee without the sensitivity crash. This is it. It doesn’t even taste like protein which I loveeee. One thing I will say is, it doesn’t pair well with milk. In the fullness aspect. I drink unsweetened soy milk ((always use the unsweetened versions whenever using a protein that way you can taste it without the strong features of a plant milk))- **Just a tip in case anyone has trouble when it comes to using plant milks with proteins- Especially almond milk****mixing it with water is the best option. And the exact amount recommended. Overall, it’s bomb and worth the try. I literally  have to pace myself because I’d have 3-4 servings throughout day if I didn’t. This is it.

I was hesitant to ingest it at first because it smelled very dusty with a slight hint of coffee but once I tried it the flavor wasn’t bad. What I like to do now is put half a scoop of this flavor and half of the gourmet vanilla one and it taste pretty good. The vanilla one is too sweet by itself but the two flavors go surprisingly well together. The container can be misleading though. They do base the amount off weight but it’s basically half of the container. Maybe make the product size smaller so it’s easier to store?

I am not a huge fan of the protein powder taste and after taste! When I opened this, I will say my immediate reaction was, “ ok smells like the rest!” But boy oh boy was I wrong with the taste! Why does this taste just like fruity peoples lol! I added a fair Life protein shake strawberry and this is one of the best protein shakes I’ve ever had!

I bought this for my daughter who has never been able to gain weight and who the Drs recently said was dangerously thin. She drinks 2 glasses a day and is putting on an average of 2 lbs a week. Due to being so thin she had lost a lot of muscle mass and the Dr said this will help her with that. Due to the improvements with the first contain6I have put in a monthly subscription for 2 containers every month. The cost is so reasonable we can afford to keep buying it.

I love the flavors of this protein. I also have the cappuccino. You can find Cappuccino at Walmart most times for less. The Mocha is hard to find. What I do not love, is the container is1/4 full at best for 35.00. That needs to addressed. All this money for barely any product.  Great little kick of caffeine, keeps me full all morning.

I recently started my fitness journey and decided to start with Dynamite. After comparing Dynamite to other protein powders they have the lowest calories,sodium, sugar, and no fats per serving. I completely love the taste it’s sweet not like other protein powders that is difficult to even finish. Definitely recommend for beginners or anybody interested in a great protein brand.

The fruity pebbles is Fantastic! It tastes great especially with milk. But the Dunkin Donuts is terrible. Now it says in the container in very small letters that it is ‘sold by weight and not volume’. Which means it comes half full. Its up to you but it’s a pretty good product!

This is officially my favorite protein powder. I mix it with oat milk and it makes the best tasting protein shake ever. It’s just like if I finished a bowl of cereal and the milk left over is this shake. Definitely recommend. Also made pancakes with it and it was amazing.
Once I picked up the tub noticed it seemed light. Before even opening the tub held it up to the light and well maybe less then half full. Feels like they could have used a smaller tub.

I thought this was going to taste weak and bitter due to it being a coffee supplement. To my surprise even mixed with cold water it reminds me of an iced cappuccino you would get from the store. It's creamy and not at all bitter, has the right amount of coffee taste to it plus with the caffeine per scoop the perfect pick me up in the morning.

Goes good with everything, I make pancakes with it, oatmeal, protein shakes etc. Doesn't give bad aftertaste or any headaches like some do I believe with the fake sugar. Will be buying again. However the cocoa pebbles is okay. Not amazing but not bad, good if you just need chocolate flavor.

I was looking for a protein powder that was actually enjoyable to drink and this is it! It mixes super easily and tastes great whether it’s with milk or even just water! Tastes exactly like a bowl of fruity pebbles. 10/10 would definitely recommend trying! The shipping was insanely fast too! Showed up at my house 3 hours after I ordered it.

love the taste the smoothness the richness...it literally came less than half full I suppose if you read the small print you'd know the ounces but the image is super deceiving and makes you think it's a regular size container. I buy a lot of proteins snd they're all almost to the top every brand I've ever bought so I didn't think to read the details I've bought many iso powders.  Other than that...I love it and despite the misleading size, I really like it and will definitely buy it again. They should really reduce e the price it's expensive for only the little bit in there but like I said I liked the taste a lot and they got me 😶‍🌫️
so far so good , no complaints. It tastes really good with no foam.
Mixes well and has a really good taste when blended

This brand is amazing! I love how it mixes, I love how it makes you feel afterwards. My only issue with this particular flavor is that it has a weird “smokey” smell to it when you’re mixing it. If you can get past that, it tastes great and I have no other problem with it!

I was taking a regular whey protein and I noticed that it made me feel very uncomfortably bloated so I decided to try this hydrolyzed way and I recommend this 100% however it is a little pricier than the regular whey so be prepared to send some money on this and their bigger bottles!
My son loves the flavor and said it's the best protein powder he's used. His roommate tried it and now it's his go to as well.

Bought both fruity and cocoa pebbles. Ordered them at 430 pm and they were here in 2 hours. Both flavors are sooo good. Have had both with water and in smoothies now. 10/10. Macros are good too. Will be back for more

Decided to get a protein powder, since I still workout. Love the taste of it! I use a blender for the powder, and it mixes good. It last about a month, if you take it every day. Get it every month now, so I don't have to order every time.

Got the fruity pebbles flavor. Tastes just like it. Im a bariatric surgery patient and this works perfect for protein intake. Love it. Blends perfect, not chunky or chalky and truly has the fruity pebble flavor. :)

I have tried so many different types of protein powders. I hate the super sweet powders as well as powders that just taste like a cardboard box. I purchased the Chocolate Peanut Butter, Cocoa Pebbles, and the Dunkin's cappuccino. All of the flavors are delicious but this Chocolate PB tastes just like a Reese Cup. I seriously cannot believe how good this is! I mix 1 scoop in 16 oz of unsweetened vanilla almond milk as a breakfast replacement or afternoon snack. Yummy!

Does anyone know what the deal is with the recent price increase here? I used to pay $26 for this whey, but now it's $32? I actually like this whey, it mixes well, tasted good, but due to this price increase I had to switch to a different brand.
Worth the price, it tastes so good compared to every other brand and it isn’t close.10/10 tastes like real chocolate no after taste either

I kid you not, Exactly like Fruity Pebbles. It blends well and I put it in my ice coffee in the morning. It doesnt get chunky or chewy. Helps me avoid sweeteners and creamers. I will continue to buy this and I'll buy the last pallet when they decide to end this flavor.
Great for protein lattes in the morning. Tastes really good and blends well.
it tastes awesome but it's only half full but i haven't used it yet so idk how well it mixes

ISO 100 by itself is a solid protein choice, dissolves well in both hot and cold drinks. Added to oatmeal is also a good way to go. The Dunkin flavor and branding does add a little cost, but their flavor is pure Dunkin, which if you are a fan, you won't be disappointed.

So tasty and lots of protein in one serving. Wasn’t chunky or gritty at all.

Tastes great and blends well. Great as a morning meal replacement. I bought it on sale and would wait till it’s on sale again before restocking

I love the flavor of this protein powder taste just like the cereal I mix mine with milk of course instead of water. This was the first and only protein powder I had ever tried and I feel like I made a great choice. Im a loyal buyer now.

Don’t be fooled by the other reviews saying you only get half a container. Sure, the container is filled only halfway, but you are still getting the 20 servings (and accurate amount of weight) it says the product has per container. I’m not sure why they chose to put it in a container way bigger than they need, but you are getting the correct amount. I, too, weighed the product myself just to double check, and it was the correct weight. Now, on to the actual powder- oh my gosh, this tastes JUST LIKE fruity pebbles! I can’t believe how amazing this tastes. It also blends extremely well, no clumping. Also no tummy issues. This is the best tasting (and best blending) protein powder I’ve had.
love this stuff but I think it is kind of dumb that it only comes less than half full

I’ve been trying to find proteins that I like and can have almost daily.This one for sure is a favorite.It mixed super well, does have that protein taste, I did mix it with my collagen and about a cup of additional coffee because it does have caffeine.I’ve tried it with milk and it was also good!Im excited to try the other coffee one now!

I find this powder the best testing out the ones I've tried before. It doesn't have a strong protein chalk gross taste. When you shake it up it does get foamy it doesn't really bother me, but it does occur. I'd get other flavors from this brand. I don't drink protein shakes as often so it's been lasting me. Taste good. Not Chalky. Mixes well.
Taste is okay, but I like strong coffee. Mixes great, no lumps. Definitely one of the better proteins I have tried.

This is a good supplement.  The container is unnecessarily large.
I mix this in my mixer cup with the ball in it and it dissolves completely leaving no powdery residue. It tastes great and makes me feel great.

I love this for when I want protein iced coffee on the go. I just add the powder to a half milk half water mixture, shake it up, and add ice cubes. It's very sweet and doesn't need any extra sweetener. I can't wait to try the other flavors!
This is the best flavored protein powder I've ever had

The ISO is clean, low in sugar, and does not cause gastrointestinal issues. The powder is flavorful, easy to mix, and easy to digest. It does not cause bloating or excessive flatulence. Good buy for intended purpose and cost. I highly recommend.

Flavor was good, artificial but had the fruity pebbles taste. Blended well. Big waste of plastic, came filled less than halfway. Hopefully it is still 20 servings. Would not pay full amount for it. I got it on sale so it was worth it.

This is the yummiest protein shake I’ve ever had. The Cocoa Pebbles flavor is so good I don’t know whether to just stick with it or try other potentially awesome flavors. Blends so easy too. I put the water in first, then the powder. Yes, try it.
One of a few protein shakes that taste good!

The protein powder itself is delicious but the huge plastic jar it comes in is terrible and wasteful. It is only half full and is large enough to take up too much pantry space and landfill space!  Many powders I've used come in re-sealable bags which are a much better option practically and environmentally.

Good stuff, I got the vanilla and the tastes was very good the price was great, but it keeps going up I’ll be looking for something else, a good bye all in all, if you get a good price bye it right away. Dave D.
It doesn’t taste bad. I blend it with banana, coffee cubes, and almond milk.

I have tried so many whey protein shakes, and I hadn’t found one that was good until I bought this one. I got the cappuccino flavor and it’s really good, blends easily, and gives me 25g of protein, very little carbs and fat. You really can’t beat that. The price is great too, compared to others. I just placed another order for a chocolate flavor. I think I found my go-to protein shake!!! Totally recommend!!!

If you read the description of the product it says 20 servings. That's exactly what you get. So how much of the container is full is void if you get 20 servings like it says! Great flavor, easy to mix with water. Plain and simple.
The taste is good. It doesn't provide you a scoop :( and I'm not sure the amount they gave is 20 servings. If so, they should put the powder in a smaller package.
This protein powder is absolutely delicious! I am not a lover of protein powder taste but I love coffee. I mix a scoop of this in almond milk and pour it on top of two shots of espresso. Delicious!
A great flavor, no chalky taste, easy to mix up, no lumps. Tastes great with unsweetened almond milk

I’ve had the cocoa pebbles and it leaves me a little bloated (very little compared to other brands that aren’t isolate) I think it’s due to the chocolate or something. The Dunkin’ cappuccino is very tasty and does not leave me bloated at all. Very easy to digest.
Love the way it tastes. Helps cut my sugar cravings as pool szn is fast approaching.I will be buying more flavor options soon.
Blends extremely well, tastes great. I had gotten vanilla and coca pebbles. I'm a vanilla guy. Cpebs was decent but vanilla is where the money is.

What a great product in an over-sized container making it difficult to store and a terrible waste of plastic for the environment.  I even wrote to the manufacturer to complain.  The container will take up a huge amount of space on your shelf for a container half full.  Does size really matter?
I bought vanilla when it was on sale because I like vanilla. Tastes good, goes down smooth.

I have used this product for years. I love the taste, the quality and easy mixing. But I really hate  the caps. They are so wide my hands are not big enough to crab them to turn them. I will continue to use this product. The get stuck if I do happen to get it to turn. Most the time I have to cut the top off (let me tell you this is no easy task). Please fix your tops to more user friendly type.

I am generally into chugging the protein shakes cause I do not like its flavor but turns out this is a real good one and you don't have to chug it. I do not even have to use any shaker to mix this cause it is easily dissolvable and takes amazing! Not super cheap but great taste.
I am in love with this! It is by far one of the best protein powders on the market. As long as you use a shaker ball and shake it well there are none of those nasty clumps!
This is my absolute favorite flavor! I am always disappointed to open the container and find it half full. I wish they would make a smaller container for easier storage

This is the best flavor of protein I’ve tried thus far. I’m taking this to gain weight and it’s definitely helped. The container is pretty big but once you open it , it’s only about half filled but other than that , great product and will be purchasing again.
La de vainilla es mi favorita, se disuelve con facilidad y la puedo mezclar con agua, leche o ambos y el sabor se siente bien con cualquiera. Una buena opción de merienda para los días agitados

Loved the taste of the chocolate not too over power can balance well with shakes and smoothies some fruits after a workout

Ok so, by itself was good but… Just tried 2 tbsp of instant bustello + 2 tbsp of hot water then added milk of choice and a scoop. Omg replacing my coffees immediately.This one’s for the coffee lovers than felt like they needed more of a coffee taste ;)

This is a good protein option. This protein is vary flavorful, and really does have that spot on fruity pebbles taste. The only con for me is i don’t really drink my protein and this powder doesn’t really go well with cooking other than pancakes. Overall if you love fruity pebbles and looking for a protein with good flavor, i would recommend.

I have to admit protein powder to me just tastes nasty and gross but seriously when I first tried the chocolate flavor I was so surprised. I actually like the flavor and it’s not chunky like other brands Ive given a try. This easily is the best flavor I had and I’m probably not getting anything else, chocolate is it. It’s exactly what you’d expect. The taste is pretty good, but when I skate it up there’s a lot of bubbles so I have to let it sit for a little while which is kind of annoying but it’s tasty

Whey protein is a mixture of proteins in whey, which is a byproduct of cheese production. It’s usually sold as a flavored powder, which is added to shakes, meal replacements, and protein bars.  Whey Protein Supplements Can Help Boost Your Protein and BCAA Intake. Proteins are the main building blocks of the human body. They’re used to make various important things, including tendons, organs and skin, as well as hormones, enzymes, neurotransmitters and various molecules. Proteins are also the building blocks of the contractile elements in your muscles. They’re assembled from amino acids, smaller molecules that are linked together like beads on a string. Some amino acids are produced by your body’s cells, while others are supplied by the food you eat. The ones that you must get from foods are termed essential amino acids. Proteins that supply all nine essential amino acids are the best, and whey protein is loaded with them. It’s particularly high in important branched-chain amino acids (BCAAs) like leucine, and also contains a high amount of cysteine (7Trusted Source). Studies show that leucine is the most anabolic (growth-promoting) amino acid, and cysteine can help boost levels of the cellular antioxidant glutathione (8Trusted Source, 9Trusted Source). Whey protein appears to be particularly effective at stimulating growth in humans. In fact, human breast milk is 60% whey, compared to 20% in cow’s milk (10Trusted Source). The main types of whey protein are concentrate, isolate and hydrolysate. They can vary in protein content, taste, digestibility and price. There is a lot of evidence that whey protein is effective at increasing muscle and strength gains, though some studies find no effect. Protein has been shown to aid weight loss by boosting metabolism and reducing appetite. Whey protein can help increase fat loss while preserving lean muscle mass. Whey is high in essential amino acids and other healthy nutrients. It’s also rich in the amino acid cysteine, which raises levels of the antioxidant glutathione and leads to many health benefits. Whey protein is very safe. A commonly recommended dose is 1–2 scoops (25–50 grams) per day.

PROS: I bought this size so that I can try it because I've never had a protein shake before and I didn't want to waste the product and my money. I actually liked it. It has pretty good flavor, the scoop was actually in the bag, not too high in calories, and a good amount of protein.CONS: I tried it with a cup of soy milk right away. Not a rich double chocolate flavor that's advertised. It's more like chocolate milk. If I used less milk the flavor was better. I can't imagine what it tastes like with water. I used a blender bottle to mix the shake. Sometimes there would still be undissolved powder at the bottom even when shaking the mixture with the blender ball vigorously. Don't count on it to keep you full for long, although it's protein, it's not much and it's still a fluid that doesn't keep you full for long.Another thing is that I tried the product with real milk, and it ended up having a sour taste. Maybe that was my taste buds because I don't like regular milk but it did taste a bit off to me.Packaging-wise I didn't like it. Like most products now, it was halfway full, the seal was a bit hard to close at first (maybe I'm just weak).OVERALL: As someone trying to lose weight, I will not purchase again for two reasons: 1) the flavor wasn't that great and 2)it didn't in any way shape or form control my hunger. I had the serving size (1 scoop -120 calories) and about a cup of soy milk (80 calories). I think it was just a waste of calories because fluid is so easy to digest so it doesn't keep you full which is the whole point of the protein. I might as well get those 24 - 30 grams of protein by eating REAL FOOD that will satiate my hunger for 3-4 hours instead of 1-2.

I am a weight lifter and I’m serious about my protein. This is by far the best tasting and mixing protein powder on the market in my opinion. I highly recommend this product.

Optimum Nutrition Gold Standard 100% Whey, Double Rich Chocolate, 1 Pound
Some background. I'm 55 years old and have not worked out since my army days in the 80s. Two years ago I had an attack of acute pancreatitis brought on by gall stones, which was fun. After spending a month in the hospital and gall bladder removal I recovered just fine. Except for the fact that any time I ate more than 6 to 10 ounces of very bland food I'd start feeling pain around my stomach and often would get very nauseous. This led me to eating lots of small meals throughout the day and way to much snacking. Over the two years I ballooned up from 185 lbs to 225 lbs. My doctor has not been able to figure out why the pain and nausea happens. They've poked. prodded, scoped every orifice, taken more blood than I honestly believe was necessary, and done every scan that they have a machine for. After finding no solution my doctor recommend I might try working out. It might help, it was very unlikely to make anything worse, and he's been wanting me to go the gym anyway.I've only been working out for 5 weeks now and taking this product for 3 weeks. And I feel great.First. The Gold Standard 100% Whey Double Chocolate tastes delicious. In milk it's just about as good as a chocolate milkshake. I have to resist the urge to drink more just for the enjoyment. In water it's not quite that good but still very tasty.Second. I only take it right after workouts which are usually 8 pm - 10 pm after work. I'm up for another 2 to 3 hours afterward and I am getting no cravings where in the past late night was my worst time for eating snacks.Third. After the first five weeks I've lost 12 lbs, feel great and look forward to the gym each day. I also so far, knock on wood, have not suffered from stomach pain or nausea in that time. I've felt the pain coming on twice at work after eating too much but after working out I've felt fine by the time I got home. In fact both times the feeling just faded unnoticed at some point during the workout. I'm still careful about what I eat but I have cautiously begun to allow myself more variety at lunch knowing I'd be heading to the gym later.I don't know how much the Gold Standard Whey is contributing to all the positive things I've listed here but I'll keep taking it. In fact I just ordered the 5lb tub. I like the flavor and look forward to having it after my workout. It has definitely cut back my late night cravings. And if it is feeding my muscles on top of that I simply don't know what more I could ask for. Simply put, I love this product and want to have it's babies.

Edit: Acesulfame Potassium is a necessary evil and much better than sucralose (at least that's what my stomach tells me).Unfortunately you cannot find an all natural protein powder with decent flavoring at a cheap cost or with the macros of ON Gold Standard whey. The only alternative is a grass fed whey product with cane sugar and cacao for $25 a 1lb bag with only 19g of protein per serving or mixing your own unflavored whey protein which just seems so tedious to me.I've decided since purchasing that organic protein powder that I'll consume ON's Gold Standard whey to augment the natural protein. You simply cannot find a better protein powder for this price with only one artificial sweetener. Also I looked into mixing my own glutamine and BCAA supplementation and noticed that I'd be forking out even more money so I'll opt for ON's Gold Standard Whey for now.Old Review:Well I thought based on the reviews that the Double Rich Chocolate version of ON's Gold Standard Whey was safe for consumption (for people with GI issues when eating artificial sweeteners) but I was dead wrong. Acesulfame Potassium is an artificial sweetener that's possibly worse than sucralose! Don't listen to the reviews stating that the Double Rich is still 'OK' if you struggle with bloat or indigestion when consuming artificial sweeteners.Unfortunately in the time that I've been out of the game so to speak (stopped weightlifting for 5 years) all of the sports nutrition companies have opted to include artificial sweeteners in their products. I cannot find a whey protein mix with real sugar which is so disappointing. I've opted for a brand that uses stevia even though I hate stevia but I guess I'll live with it.

The protein from the company of the leader of sports nutrition ON 100% Whey Gold Standart is almost the best of its kind among proteins. I'm not a fan of flavored protein powder, almost as a rule. I prefer throwing matcha or fruit into the blender myself. I hate fake sugar, it usually upsets my stomach and makes me regret my life's choices.This brand's double chocolate flavor is one of the only I can enjoy. And believe me, I have tried a lot of different brands. Not only is it pretty tasty, it's ridiculously easy to blend. If I'm doing a heavy lifting session and need protein afterwards, I don't even have to wait to get home. I can just throw a scoop of this at the bottom of an empty water bottle, add water at the gym after my workout, and shake it to mix. I'm sure a blender ball would probably work better, but this stuff is so easy to mix that vigorous shaking does the trick for all but a few specks at the bottom.Protein powder should be easy; why bother with accessories unless you're planning on actually cooking real food? I like this because it indulges my laziness, tastes pretty good, and doesn't make my whole digestive tract try to explosively exit my body lest I be stupid enough to have it on an empty stomach.That's really all I ask for.

I was looking for a chocolate protein powder with sufficient protein and low calories. Online searches brought me to this brand and I was not disappointed. I have been trying these for 20 years and have never been able to stomach them. Purchased the small bag to test it out, as some of the other reviews had me concerned. Some were complaining that the formula changed, and that the new taste was bad. Others were saying that it is their favorite because of how incredible the flavor is (with others saying it was far too sweet).First of all, I will say that I like the taste. To describe one serving would be like when you were a kid and you didn't put enough Nesquik powder your the milk. The flavor is clearly chocolatey, but it isn't overpowering. As an adult, I really love this taste, and despite using Combat Vanilla for years, there is something about this that I occasionally craved. Because I have protein shakes predominantly in the mornings, I'm not looking for something too sweet. This gives me the feeling that I'm having a light chocolate milk without feeling like I overindulged. Though to call it "double rich" is certainly an overstatement!

Overall, I like this powder a lot better than than the Slim Fast powder I was using before and other powders I’ve tried. It doesn’t have as much of a fake sugar taste or any other weird after tastes either, at least not as much compared to some. It does say “instantized” so you can mix with a spoon but you really can’t or you’ll have lumps.. the pic was after vigorously stirring for a minute, ended up using a small whisk after. I mixed it with vanilla Almond breeze (the one with a touch of honey) and it was just barely sweet, which I like especially in the morning.
It tastes amazing! It resolves in the milk so easily and it taste really good. I would definitely buy it again.

Seriously, if they offered build your own variety packs I would jump on that deal so fast. As for those who keep saying the container is only half full, different flavors will vary in weight slightly. They have the standard large container to fit all powders since you are buying by WEIGHT not by package. Some flavors will be denser (like chocolate) than others causing the half full bottle. They also need there to be some room in the bottle for sifting since it is a powder much like flour.

Slightly less sweet than before I think? But mostly the same.

Look, I'm no expert when it comes to protein powder so this is an average Joe review. Taste wise it's great and packed with flavor, it doesn't seem to be the easiest to blend though and the ingredients are pretty straight forward.

The chocolate is the best flavor by far!!! It’s good and reminds me of drinking ovaltine as a child. If you branch out and try the other flavors make sure to buy this size first.  I bought a large package of the banana and quickly got sick of the flavor (it tastes like banana Larry taffy or the yellow bananas you find in the rings candy package.

Looks: Like just about every other protein powder.Smells: Faint, rich chocolate scent.Tastes: Good flavor, but not much of it.  I found that a little extra power plus a teaspoon or so of sucralose substantially improves the taste.Feels: Not as filling as some I've tried, but acceptable as a post-workout drink.Bottom line: Ranks maybe in the upper third of whey powders I've tried.  Could use more flavor, and maybe a little fiber to bulk it out.  Four stars.

I wanted to write a review for the dark chocolate flavor since some of the other reviews seemed to go back and forth, which made it difficult for me to decide which new protein to try.I am glad I decided to give this a try. For anyone looking for a good tasting protein powder, this is it. It has a similar taste to watered down chocolate milk and is not gross what’s so ever. It also mixes well in a smoothie and did not over power the taste.

I was travelling in the states and needed a smaller container for my daily shake powder. I ordered online and it was waiting for me at my first stop on my two week trip.I found the powder to dissolve well in my shake and it was palatable.Nutritional value was one of the more important decisive factors in choosing this product.Thank you

Absolutely delicious protein powder. I have wasted money on too many with weird after taste or totally artificial sweetener flavor. This was great. I see they make a lot of other flavors and I will definitely be trying more.

Honestly this product tastes so good I almost don't care if it's for protein anymore, I could drink it as a chocolate milk for all I know (although don't do that because too much protein can upset your GI system).Blends great with my blender bottle, but I find it needs to be dissolved in water first before adding any milk, won't blend if you just add all milk!

This is my favorite protein powder I've tried over the years. It has a distinct chocolatey flavor that you can control the intensity with the amount of water/milk you add. I like to also add 1-2 T of PB Fit for more protein and flavor dimension. My stomach is not upset by this formula like other powders. I do get a bit of a bad aftertaste once I finish the shake, but I've always gotten that with low-sugar shakes. Overall, love it!

I bought the 1 lb bag to try it out.  I've used several others that are cheaper.  This one is better, but marginally.  The taste was okay, nutrition slightly better, but I am not sure the price difference was worth it (comparing the 4 lb prices).  ON is a good trustworthy brand, though.  You know what you are getting.  It is not a terrible price, too. Guess it is up to you.I buy ON's Casein, though.  That stuff is awesome!  Great taste, texture, thick, and great for overnight recovery.

Truthfully, I have no idea if this is good for you. Read the other reviews. I flunked college biology twice. However, I cannot believe how great this tastes. Also it is great for lunch as it really fills me up and it's super easy to make. Because I work out of my home, I can take a half of a banana, cup of skim milk, cup of crushed ice and 30 seconds in the blender and it is incredible. It also seems the chocolate gives me a caffein boost to push through the day.

This certainly is the best whey I’ve used, but it blends best if you use an electric blender, and it tastes best if you actually use milk. Using my shaker cup always leaves little chocolate pellets floating around and water alone does not have the best taste.

This is my second bag. I used to drink chocolate Shakeol....but I cant afford it anymore. Lucky me, I tried this one the first time and I love it. Is not as sweet as Shakeol...but is a very good substitute. I use the same shake recipe, Almond milk, PB powder, coconut flavor and 10 raw almonds and VOILA!!! Delicious shake no after taste at all. I recommend it 100%. I have lost over 90 pounds replacing a meal. I use it as a meal replacement mostly at dinner time. You can add some chia seeds of flax seeds to get you a more fullness effect.
Double chocolate tastes pretty bad with water, but I've heard it is better with milk.  Problem is, I don't like milk either.

I have a sensitive stomach and this has worked out great. I looked at the other reviews before buying and all the ingredients in the Double Rich Chocolate are good to go for me (I follow FODMAP if you know what that is and this hasn't bothered my guts). Not sure about the other flavors since the ingredients are different and some of them I HAVE to avoid. The taste is great. Love it with 1/2 cup of almond milk (I think having that amount of liquid makes the consistency great).
Love this protein powder, taste is great.

I’m sure this has some top notch ingredients. Everything you need in a protein powder. The issue is so do other brands, and they don’t taste this bad, so why choke down something you don’t like when you don’t have to? I add some stevia to get it down because to me this tastes like unsweetened cocoa powder. I’ve mixed it with water, milk, and almond milk. Still blah. I’m giving 3 stars because while it tastes bad, it still works as it should (I’m guessing, as I haven’t sent it to a lab for testing or anything). For my money I recommend PEScience select protein. Tastes much better (cake pop especially).

I tried to get into protein powder this year when I really started to work out. It was a nice way to swap out meals and still get a good source of protein. I'm not a fan of the taste of this one with water, but with almond milk or regular milk, it was pretty good. I never got a second bag because I haven't used it enough, but if I get back into it again I would repurchase from Gold Standard

Dissolves very well. Tastes very good. Not gritty.  Tastes like thick chocolate milk when mixed with milk. Tastes better than many others even when mixed with water.. Better finished result over Body Fortress Cookies and Cream.
Very good if put in milk, or smoothie, high quality, would recommend

I’ve steered away from protein powders because they tend to taste terrible. After reading many reviews of the rich chocolate flavor I decided to give it a try with the smallest size. It tastes amazing! There is no aftertaste which surprised me. I mix it with low calorie almond milk. Before my work out I throw it in the freezer for about an hour or so, let it defrost while I work out, add the powder and it tastes like a chocolate shake. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to enjoy drinking protein.
I have just started eating protein pack and till now the flavor looks good, will update if there comes any issue.

So tasty. I was worried about the reviews but I know I had this years ago and loved it, so I had to try it again. Tastes just like I remember.It's not easy to blend with just one of the shaking cups. You really need a blender (I have a mini, one serving one that's perfect) to make it taste really rich and smooth. And use almond milk!

I've tried a few protein powders and this one is by far my favorite.  Tastes good, blends, well, and is decently priced in comparison to other brands.  I like to shake mine up with 8 ounces of Coconut milk post-workout.  I also chose this product because it doesn't contain sucralose. (Sucrolose gives me headaches.)  I know some of the other flavors may contain it, but the Chocolate doesn't and I hope that they keep it that way!

This is the best protein powder I've tried so far. The flavor is great and it mixed very easily with no clumps whatsoever. I thought it was too expensive to keep buying so I just purchased the chocolate body fortress instead. But it turns out the scoop size is almost double with body fortress so the price difference is actually negligible. Knowing that, I wish I had just purchased this powder again. The flavor is so much better.

I cant not even begin to explain how delicious this whey protein is. The powder is so smooth and has no nasty after taste as most whey proteins tend to have. I got a smaller package to "test" it out and I will definitely be ordering a bigger one!!! This will not disappoint.

This powder is awesome. It taste great in a smoothie, my favorite being banana, and shaken up in a Blender bottle. There isn't any chalkiness or gross texture either. It has very low sugar too, making it almost all protein for bulking up. Any person serious about getting big needs this product. Without all the heightened cholesterol and large fat intake your body is exposed to eating red meat to get protein, you can rest assured this is going to work sans health issues. I recommend it to anybody looking to build muscle mass.

All these protein shake pretty much do the same thing. If they are all the same, I'd rather get tasty one. This is super good. If you add little bit of milk, it taste like chocolate shake. Highly recommend.

Just ordered more of this product!  Love the taste and quality of the product. Every morning I drink one since I don’t have time to sit down and eat breakfast. Keeps me full until lunch time and taste great!
Dissolved fine and easy on my stomach

Double Rich Chocolate:Its been a while since I used Whey protein (moved on to plant-based) but when I did use this, man it was delicious. By far some of the best protein shakes I ever had in my life.  The taste was fantastic, the texture was very smooth, and I looked forward to drinking it. Not to mention, of course, the gains that it provided.If you are looking to purchase a Whey protein powder, nothing beats Optimum Nutrition.
Tried this from a friend of mine & had to get some for myself. Loved getting this in the mail instead of having to go to the store - same price, same quality, same product.

I prefer the other ON chocolate whey powder, but it's not available. I use this stuff to stay awake. I'm 73 and have trouble with my sleep and staying awake, so the chocolate helps, and the wey has nutritional value, I'm told. I prefer this to similar products, but for that above.
This is a great product to purchase for protein if you're not a huge consumer of meats. After a workout I like to make a shake with milk. Great bold chocolaty taste!

First protein powder that I can drink with just water. I do have a bit of a time breaking down the powder, but I bought a bender bottle to hopefully help with that in the future. (I have been using a straw or spoon). I have already gone through 2 of the 1 lb bags of the chocolate flavor and just ordered the 5 lb container to hold me over.
protein powder for post workouts.

I got this flavor because I was craving strawberry nesquik milk. The aroma from this powder is incredible when you open it and smell it. Unfortunately the taste is not as good, now. It's not bad but it's not as good as nesquik. I guess I should temper my expectations as it is a protein powder. However, the most daunting part of this powder is not its taste, but it's side effects. It gives me the most violent, consistent and frequent farts I've ever had. They are short, sometimes silent, and always deadly. I will try to return but if not I know what to give to my enemies.

I've read various info about being a diabetic and consuming protein powder so I might just chill on the protein powder use until I can get my diabetes under control. I know some times kidneys can have a hard time with releasing protein in the urine. Which is supposed to be bad. With that said. The taste is very good. None of that chalky taste or a bitter after taste like some powders. One reason I avoid stevia or aspartame sweetened products. It mixes well so that's a plus. No blender is even needed. Just a shaker will do. Over all I would give this a recommendation if someone is just seeking quality whey protein added to their diet. Whey usually ranks very high among various types of protein. There's not many nutrients in this stuff but this is a protein supplement that anyone can use. For that extra energy or building muscle. Any thing in between. It's an isolate so it shouldn't bother your stomach like some of the whey protein powder can.

I was wondering whether the flavor would be good, not so artificial. And it was good. But note that the strawberry flavor would not let any other fruit/anything flavor to be felt. I used to mix it with banana, tried also orange, but the flavor is so strong that you feel only strawberry.

When mixed with oatmeal it tastes a lot like Quaker’s strawberries & cream instant - but a little less sweet (which I prefer).It mixes really easily with no clumps ever. I’ve also use ON’s mint chocolate flavor which sometimes does clump. The powder for this one seems a lot finer (more like flour) which what I suspect makes it blend easier.Also other Whey proteins tend to upset my stomach but Optimum Nutrition’s stuff doesn’t for some reason.I mix it 1 cup of Oatmilk and 1/2 a cup of plain quick oats for part of my breakfast.
Love the taste and works well.

Definitely satisfied with the delivery and the product. The flavor when mixed with water is weaker but when is mixed with mil it’s really delicious, the powder got completely solved and you only feel fluid liquid in your throat… completely brand new and authentic product. Thanks once again to Amazon didn’t disappoint me.
This protein powder has a tendency to be a tad gritty.  Taste is good though.
Me encanta su sabor y olor. Es deliciosa .

I think a sifter at the top under the cap that u can reshape for ur cup that allows you to shred the ingredients finely or well deisgned designer cutting spoon is just needed. Something u can mix it finely with ice cream if u so choosed. ? Or maybe a mini mixer with it? That cuts it up at its coldest without a mixer

The flavor is pretty good but it's clumpy af. Its really hard to drink it down when I'm anticipating slimy clumps of powder regardless of how I shake it up. I'll have to figure out a way to use it up but I don't think ill get this brand again.Edit to add: mixing with milk or even half milk half water helps it dissolve much better than just water.
I used nitrotech before this and it doesn't taste as good as that and not that thick either. Probably won't buy again but does the job. Mixing also takes more effort that nitrotech
So so so yummy, like nesquick strawberry milk, and  blends 100%. Im super picky and hate textures, and this is like dessert.
I USE THIS MIX AT LEAST TWICE A DAY. IT SUPPLIES ME WITH THE NUTRIENTS MY BODY NEEDS TO NOT BE OR FEEL HUNGRY ALL THE TIME.

This is what it says it is - you can very much so taste the strawberry and the crème. I do mine with Skim milk so all the flavor really pops, but I like it! It’s a little overwhelming though so I may have to start doing half milk half water - we’ll see. The flavor profile is a little too intense and overly sweet sitting after you’re done drinking it, but for the price it’s good stuff. I’ll probably do a chocolate flavor next, but it’s good!UPDATE: been using it for a week twice a day and I’m getting a little sick of it… and word of warning tastes HORRIBLE with water. Milk only for this one. Probably gonna steer clear in the future.
Disappointed due to taste.
If you’re looking for great quality whey that actually taste good, this is a good recommendation. It’s way better than what I have tried so far.
Happy

I have been searching for a protein powder with flavor that made it easy to drink multiple times a day and this one blows them all out of the water! It mixes really easily, doesn't leave a weird aftertaste like some other whey proteins I've tried, and it just plain tastes awesome. I use it in conjunction with my Optimum Nutrition Creatine and it has helped me gain muscle now that I found something I can have consistently.
exactly what I was expecting. Powder blends easily , just few seconds shaking the bottle and is good to go.
My favorite whey powder by far.
Best protein powder on the market for the price in my opinion

You can really smell the creme, after opening it. Overall, better than the others that i have tried.Seems like real ' 100% whey. No caffeine added. I would be able to tell aftet trying this whey.So, yeah! I would recommend this product. Great👍
Best protein hands down
Love this, helps me calm my cravings for sweets!
Love the flavor
So I think the strawberry and cream flavor is pretty good it just wasn’t sweet at all. I thing a little bit of sugar would have made it a lot better to drink.
good flavour 👍🏻
Overall a really great product.
Cookies and Cream is the best whey protein flavor I’ve ever had,it just tastes amazing,remembers me of a milkshake taste!

Best flavor, I mixed it with Quakers high fiber maple and brown sugar oatmeal and highly recommend you do the same. Heat up the oatmeal first and then mix the powder in after.. you’ll have to add more water in than required for the oatmeal for the powder to mix in. It’s my daily breakfast and the macros are great.
Prefer Muscle milk but it's good enough.

This top of the line protein powder.  Tastes great and mixes easily.  Unfortunately, I have a dairy product reaction to it.  My body does not digest it well and if you have that sensitivity, this product will be a little hard on you.  If you do not have that allergy,  buy it!  It is top quality.
Muy bueno en todos los sentidos, cuesta un poco que se disuelva pero lo demás excelente
I like the strawberry flavor and it tastes better than just regular milk. And I get protein too, it's a win-win.

I love this brand and won’t be switching anytime soon! I have purchased the vanilla ice cream flavor in the past and wanted to mix it up this time around, so I went with strawberries and cream. I was a little nervous because I couldn’t find a ton of reviews on it but decided to give it a shot anyway. I’m glad I did. The flavor is sweet, but not too sweet, and it does have a creamy flavor to it. I mix mine with almond milk and it blends nicely, doesn’t leave think clumps of powder, and overall is a quality protein powder. I’d highly recommend this flavor and this company.

Wow wow wow!!! This is absolutely delicious!! I never write reviews, so if that doesn't say how good this is that I feel the need to write a review I dont know what will. I just got the strawberries and cream flavor today. I just shook it up with some milk and absolutely loved it, it tastes like a strawberry milkshake! I wasnt expecting to like it shaken up by itself, I was expecting to take a sip and taste a weird protein flavor then blend it into other things in a smoothie, but figured I should try it alone first. Highly recommend you try the strawberries and cream flavor if you want to just shake up some delicious strawberry milk.

The strawberry & cream has more of a bland taste rather than flavorable but I kind of like for that fact because it’s not too far off from water itself.  My favorite would still be BSN Syntha-6 edge strawberry but if it wasn’t it stock then I’d easy buy this again.
The best tasting protein powder that I’ve ever purchased

I had used this brand for years off and on with other names brands. It is very good. It tastes good and blends very well in a shaker or in the blender. Most of the time I put it into a smoothie with spinach, Kale, with different types of fruits. I may add super greens powder in it. Over all it tastes great.Just a side note. I needed this product for muscle recover after weight training. I tried the product as recommended but it immediately made me sick. I couldn't keep it down most likely due to the milk it contains and certain ingredients. It's not catered to sensitive stomachs, and my doc recommended I discontinue. I've only used this product twice so far but the taste is spectacular! Much better than most brands I have used. The ingredients seem legit as well. This one is nice as it tastes good with just water while most other brands are hard to swallow, although I much prefer to use milk. I will def. be getting this again when I need a refill!

I recently purchased this based on all the reviews I read and was somewhat disappointed in the taste. I do not like it as much as others are raving. I felt is was lacking in flavor. Vanilla Ice Cream is much better. Blending power is great though. I put it in the special cup I purchased and it always turns out perfect. Wish this had a little more strawberry flavor and not much a chemical flavor. I probably would not buy again based on flavor but instead would switch to another flavor by Optimum Nutrition.
I’ve tried the vanilla flavor before and loved it. I bought this one because I love strawberry. I was disappointed by the flavor as it was a very weak flavor.

The product is 100% original, mixes easily with water milk and juice and has a good taste. (If you dont want it to taste chemically my advice is to choose simple flavors (strawberry, chocolate)).It actually is a great deal for 24g of high quality protein per serving.
It could be better and I don’t want to risk getting kidney stones
Tried the strawberry creme. It smelled like a hazardous chemical, and I hated to medicine-like taste.  I liked the vanilla and the double chocolate though.
The taste of this flavor is perfect! I hope they never change it.

I just received this and it smells great! I ordered the strawberry flavor. It was packaged perfectly and sealed properly. It taste great with almond milk and a banana, I make it in the magic bullet mixer for breakfast and its so good.

I have been using for years. I like the equity flavors particularly the fruit punch. I do not like any chocolate whey protein. Always seems to me to taste artificial so I Jean towards the fruit flavors. Love the fact that it contains lactase since I am lactose intolerant. Great product for reasonable price.

Within the last few months, I bought this product in French vanilla and strawberry. Well, the banana cream is up there!!!  I thought the other two were great, but this one is my favorite. Blends well in shakes or yogurt. Great purchase!
I got the strawberry cream flavor and it tastes great. Similar flavor profile to strawberry milk.
I know a lot of protein flavors aren’t the best so I’m not very picky but this one does not taste good at all. Would not recommend.

Overall okay. Used it for my overnight oats. Powdery taste but good source of protein
I got strawberry cream and it tasted better than I thought it would. Almost exactly like a strawberry milkshake.
My overall favorite flavor.  I don't buy any unless I can get this flavor. It's a must for my workouts. My son lives to drink a little as well. It blends easy in my shaker and the quality is great.
Not the best flavour but great protein.
The flavor is underwhelming. Very mild compared to the other flavors.

Bought so I could get lil extra protein in, on the run... Been years since gym n protein shakes, so wasn't sure how taste. But far surpassed expectations... I am getting back into exercising regularly and am taking protein intake seriously. I usually don't have much protein daily and that needed to change! This is so easy to mix and squeeze in for breakfast, snack, and of course use as a post workout! Peanut butter is YUMMMM.

The taste is absolutely on point with the Chocolate Peanutbutter, even with water instead of milk! The Mocha Cappuccino flavor was good too (not as great with water) but the Chocolate Peanutbutter is near perfect and if it was a normal drink I'd probably drink it just because it tastes good (a thicker drink with less water makes a big difference too, like smoothie viscosity). I don't even use milk anymore because I don't need it with this one to carry the taste and water cleans much faster. I drink this multiple times a day  and it's the only flavor I've ever tried that goes down without a hint of that gross protein flavor that most protein powders I've tried have. Awesome product. Finally getting enough protein in my body and I see the gains! The peanut butter taste is way too potent and destroys the after taste. I would just go with an original flavor like chocolate or vanilla and your solid.
